snippet: The Food and Drug Administration said Tuesday that the Xvivo Perfusion System could lead to more successful transplants of lungs for people with cystic fibrosis and other deadly respiratory diseases.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration said Tuesday that the Xvivo Perfusion System could lead to more successful transplants of lungs for people with cystic fibrosis and other deadly respiratory diseases.

headline.main: Lung Transplant Device Receives Federal Approval
headline.print_headline: Lung Transplant Device Receives Federal Approval
